author: jon
msg: add image done by pier a long time ago as it is pretty nice and we shouldn't loose it

author: craigmcc
msg: Add a test for receiving two headers with the same name.  NOTE:  The
HttpURLConnection class does not handle this correctly, so the test client
now has the option to use a low-level socket connection instead of
HttpURLConnection on each test.  To enable this, simply set the "protocol"

author: craigmcc
msg: Modify the build scripts (per the pattern already in place) to copy
jndi.jar to the binary distribution.  The JNDI license says it allows
As a result, you will now need to have JNDI 1.2.1 downloaded, and point at
it with a JNDI_HOME environment variable, in order to build Tomcat 4.0.
